scripts.build:all:dev: npm run spec:generate && npm run build:webpack && npm run generate:types && npm run assert:umd-bundles && npm run analyze:build-artifacts && npm run governance:manifest
scripts.build:all:full: npm run spec:generate && npm run build:webpack:full && npm run generate:types && npm run assert:umd-bundles && npm run analyze:build-artifacts && npm run governance:manifest
scripts.build:ci: npm run spec:generate && npm run spec:drift-guard && npm run build:webpack && npm run generate:types && npm run assert:umd-bundles && npm run analyze:build-artifacts && npm run governance:manifest
scripts.build:webpack: npm run build:browser:esm && npm run build:server:esm && npm run build:browser:umd && npm run build:server:umd && node scripts/prod/generate-source-maps.js
scripts.build:webpack:full: npm run build:browser:esm:full && npm run build:server:esm:full && npm run build:browser:umd:full && npm run build:server:umd:full
scripts.build:browser:umd:full: cross-env FULL=1 webpack --config webpack.browser.umd.config.js && node scripts/prod/generate-source-maps.js
scripts.build:server:umd:full: cross-env FULL=1 webpack --config webpack.server.umd.config.js && node scripts/prod/generate-source-maps.js
scripts.build:browser: npm run spec:generate && npm run build:browser:esm && npm run build:browser:umd
scripts.build:server: npm run spec:generate && npm run build:server:esm && npm run build:server:umd
scripts.test:all-builds: npm run test:server && npm run test:browser && npm run test:umd-server && npm run test:umd-browser
scripts.test:all-builds:csp: npm run test:all-builds && npm run check:csp
scripts.test:builds-parallel: npm run test:server & npm run test:browser & npm run test:umd-server & npm run test:umd-browser & wait
scripts.size:check: npm run size && npm run size:compare
scripts.analyze:browser-umd: cross-env ANALYZE_OPEN=false ANALYZE_MODE=static ANALYZE_PORT=8889 webpack --config webpack.analyzer.config.js --env buildTarget=browser
scripts.analyze:all: npm run build && npm run analyze:server-umd && npm run analyze:browser-umd
scripts.analyze:reports: cross-env ANALYZE_OPEN=false ANALYZE_MODE=static npm run analyze:all
scripts.analyze:build-artifacts: npm run analyze:build:server && npm run analyze:build:browser
scripts.analyze:build:server: cross-env ANALYZE_OPEN=false ANALYZE_MODE=static webpack --config webpack.analyzer.config.js --env buildTarget=server && cross-env ANALYZE_OPEN=false ANALYZE_MODE=static FULL=1 webpack --config webpack.analyzer.config.js --env buildTarget=server
scripts.analyze:build:browser: cross-env ANALYZE_OPEN=false ANALYZE_MODE=static webpack --config webpack.analyzer.config.js --env buildTarget=browser && cross-env ANALYZE_OPEN=false ANALYZE_MODE=static FULL=1 webpack --config webpack.analyzer.config.js --env buildTarget=browser
scripts.spec:validate: echo 'AsyncAPI validation only available in CI (to avoid dependency conflicts)'
scripts.spec:generate:html: echo 'AsyncAPI HTML generation only available in CI (to avoid dependency conflicts)'
scripts.spec:generate:json: echo 'Using source spec directly from config/specs/asyncapi.yaml'
scripts.spec:generate: npm run spec:version && npm run spec:types && npm run spec:validators && npm run spec:constants
